p: The yield and antioxidant activity data were subjected to variance analysis (ANOVA) and their means were compared performing the Tukey test (at a significance level of p < 0.05). Principal component analysis (PCA) was performed using a matrix correlation. In addition, the Euclidean distance and complete binding were used for the hierarchical cluster analysis (HCA) of the samples. The statistical analyses were conducted using Statistica Â® 13.1 (TIBCO Software Inc., Palo Alto, CA, USA).
